title: The Drawings of Leonardo Da Vinci
creator_credit: Adrian de Potier, Basil Wright and British Film Institute
brief_description: Drawings and notes of Leonardo da Vinci from the Royal Collection at Windsor Castle, the Royal Academy and the British Museum with some comment and explanation, to celebrate the quincentenary of Leonardo’s birth. Narrated by Sir Laurence Olivier.
creator_credit_for_label: Adrian de Potier, Basil Wright and British Film Institute
